spec_data.Name: open-sendmail
spec_data.Description:
Open-Sendmail is the open development of additional m4 files
used to generate and enhance sendmail.cf. The project contains
sendmail goodies previously provided at anfi.homeunix.net and
additional items.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:43:56 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Additional m4 files used to generate sendmail.cf
